blur_detection.description: The receipt image is well-focused with clear, readable text and sharp edges throughout the document.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action required as the image quality is suitable for text recognition.

contrast_assessment.description: The black text is highly legible against the white receipt paper, providing excellent contrast for automated reading.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No adjustment needed as contrast is optimal for data extraction.

glare_identification.description: No noticeable glare or reflections appear on the receipt surface that would interfere with text recognition.
glare_identification.recommendation: Current lighting conditions are appropriate for document scanning.

water_stains.description: No water damage, stains, or discoloration visible on the receipt that would affect text readability.
water_stains.recommendation: Continue to keep receipts dry and protected from liquids.

tears_or_folds.description: The receipt appears mostly flat with minimal creasing that does not impact text legibility.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: Continue handling receipts carefully to prevent damage.

cut_off_detection.description: All edges of the receipt are visible within the frame with no content appearing to be cut off.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: Current framing technique is appropriate for document capture.

missing_sections.description: The receipt appears complete with header information, line items, totals, and footer details all visible.
missing_sections.recommendation: Continue capturing the full receipt in a single frame.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows, or other objects are obstructing the view of the receipt content.
obstructions.recommendation: Current capture technique works well for avoiding obstructions.
